name: Washerwoman
firstNightReminder: Show the character token of a Townsfolk in play. Point to two players, one of which is that character.
ability: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Townsfolk.

name: Knight
firstNightReminder: Point to two players, both of which are not the Demon.
ability: You start knowing 2 players that are not the demon.

name: Sailor
firstNightReminder: The Sailor points to a living player. Either the Sailor, or the chosen player, is drunk.
otherNightReminder: The previously drunk player is no longer drunk. The Sailor points to a living player. Either the Sailor, or the chosen player, is drunk.
ability: Each night, choose an alive player: either you or they are drunk until dusk. You can't die.

name: Prophet
firstNightReminder: The Prophet points to a player. Mark that player as being prophesied.
otherNightReminder: If the prophesied player has died, show their character to the Prophet. The Prophet chooses a new player to prophesy.
ability: Each night, choose a living player. If they are dead by dusk, you learn their character.

name: Wizard
firstNightReminder: Show a not-in-play character to the wizard.
otherNightReminder: If the wizard was mad about being a previously shown character, treat them as being said character. Show a not-in-play character to the wizard.
ability: Each night, you learn a not-in-play character. Tomorrow, if you are mad about being them, you gain their ability until following dawn.

name: Familiar
firstNightReminder: The familiar chooses a character. If not in play, change their token with the chosen character. Choose whether or not they change alignment. Wake the wizard separately and point to the familiar.
otherNightReminder: The familiar chooses a character. If not in play, change their token with the chosen character. Choose whether or not they change alignment.
ability: Each night, choose a character: if not in play, you become them and might change alignment. The wizard knows who you are. [+Wizard]

name: Town Crier
otherNightReminder: Nod 'yes' or shake head 'no' for whether a Minion nominated today. Place the 'Minion not nominated' marker (remove 'Minion nominated', if any).
ability: Each night*, you learn if a Minion nominated today.

name: Duelist
otherNightReminder: The duelist may point to a player other than themselves. Choose whether the Duelist, the chosen player or both die.
ability: Each night*, you may choose a player (other than yourself): you, them or both might die.

name: Slayer
ability: Once per game, during the day, publicly choose a player: if they are the Demon, they die.

name: Lord
ability: When executed, you won't die if at least one neighbor can vote.

name: Minstrel
ability: When a Minion dies by execution, all other players (except Travellers) are drunk until dusk tomorrow.

name: Fool
ability: The first time you die, you don't.

name: Executioner
ability: If someone was executed today, you can't die until dawn.

name: Necromancer
otherNightReminder: You may choose a player to resurrect. Put a drunk token next to them.
ability: Each night*, a dead player might be resurrected, but is drunk for the rest of the game.

name: Blackguard
ability: When good wins, Outsiders win instead. [+1 Outsider]

name: Harlot
ability: The first player to nominate you dies if they are not the demon.

name: Drunk
ability: You do not know you are the Drunk. You think you are a Townsfolk character, but you are not.

name: Devil's Advocate
firstNightReminder: The Devil’s Advocate points to a living player. That player survives execution tomorrow.
otherNightReminder: The Devil’s Advocate points to a living player, different from the previous night. That player survives execution tomorrow.
ability: Each night, choose a living player (different to last night): if executed tomorrow, they don't die.

name: Witch
firstNightReminder: The Witch points to a player. If that player nominates tomorrow they die immediately.
otherNightReminder: If there are 4 or more players alive: The Witch points to a player. If that player nominates tomorrow they die immediately.
ability: Each night, choose a player: if they nominate tomorrow, they die. If just 3 players live, you lose this ability.

name: Grim
otherNightReminder: The Grim points to a player. That player dies. If the previously killed player does not have their vote token, they are resurrected.
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If they do not have their vote token by dusk, they are resurrected.

name: Leper
otherNightReminder: If the leper nominated a player, put the infected token next to that player's character.
ability: You die when nominating. During the night, the player you nominated gains your ability.

name: Vigormortis
otherNightReminder: The Vigormortis points to a player. That player dies. If a Minion, they keep their ability and one of their Townsfolk neighbours is poisoned.
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Minions you kill keep their ability & poison 1 Townsfolk neighbour. [−1 Outsider]

name: Dragon
otherNightReminder: Point to all living tributes. The Dragon points to a living tribute. That player dies. If there are no living tributes, the dragon points to 2 players. They die.
ability: Each night*, choose a living tribute (if none, choose 2 players): they die. Players can self-tribute publicly but are poisoned if good.

name: Shabaloth
otherNightReminder: One player that the Shabaloth chose the previous night might be resurrected. The Shabaloth points to two players. Those players die.
ability: Each night*, choose 2 players: they die. A dead player you chose last night might be regurgitated.
